channel.title: I Need Help!
channel.description: This is the forum to go to if you are having trouble with a certain mod/mutator.

item.title: Unreal Movie Studio :o
item.author: invalid@example.com (GTD-Carthage)
item.dc:creator: GTD-Carthage
item.content:encoded:
Hi, guys! The last time I was here, I promised a review to help get back up but I guess I'm quite incapable of so since I've got too much business already elsewhere...

This time, I'm in need of help looking for UMS, or 'Unreal Movie Studio' by UnFramed Productions. Any of you who have played Operation Na Pali or any single-player map-pack for Unreal Tournament 1999 should already have stumbled upon UMS. Right now though, UnFramed Productions is already dead (for a very very looooong time...

Unreal Movie Studio

item.title: Making a Community MOD?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Median12)
item.dc:creator: Median12
item.content:encoded:
Hi all

I am making a single-player MOD for UT2004 (Occupant17, its got a post in Content Releases)

I am a mapper, and after trying to understand others' MOD principles I am so lost.

It will be my first Community MOD and I looked for some sort of tutorial but found I usually got a 404 because UT2004 is old.

I am adding to UT2004, 3369 version:

A new Intro Movie (new NvidiaLogo)
.ut2 map files (how do you turn them into different classes as in DM, CTF etc..?)
New Logo and new...

Making a Community MOD?

item.title: WAR weapons mutator?!

item.dc:creator: Drunken_Peamole
item.content:encoded: Has anyone here heard of "WAR mutator" for UT99? It has guns in it like the "Kill-O-Matic" and "Blitz Gun"... I can't find it but it was my personal favorite. Does anyone have a link? Thanks.

item.title: I cant get mod to work, need help
item.author: invalid@example.com (Homicide13)
item.dc:creator: Homicide13
item.content:encoded:
im trying to install the feba2 mod, (for ut99) and every time i try to put in a destanation folder, it says that i need to have it in the folder that UT is installed in, whitch would me the systoms folder, but destanation folder IS my systoms folder.... i cant figure it out, ut runs and plays fine, and ive had it for like, a year, so its not courupt or anything

i need help.........

item.title: Need help with enhanced sniper mutator on LAN
item.author: invalid@example.com (Fragzilla)
item.dc:creator: Fragzilla
item.content:encoded:
I have been playing with the enhanced sniper mutator for a year or so on single player and it works flawlessly. Recently I have tried using it on a LAN with my computer as the server and it does not work. It will display the new crosshair and will show a zoom value of xx, but it does not actually zoom in. I tried adding the line "serverpackages=enhancedsniper" to the .ini and now it causes a fatal error that says unable to find enhanced sniper. I have also added the strings to the...

Need help with enhanced sniper mutator on LAN

item.title: help! mutate w/ custom exec functions
item.author: invalid@example.com (fallenstarr)
item.dc:creator: fallenstarr
item.content:encoded:
I'm trying to make a mutator that would allow admin's to enter custom commands in the console and have them executed through mutate. I have the following working now:

- Mutate checks for admin and allows execution of mutator functions
- Write to custom config file

Ok, i know that isn't much but i'm just starting

I have my mutator class MutMine and within that file I have the mutate function calls the custom function in the same class depending on the command string.

As a...

help! mutate w/ custom exec functions

item.title: FEBA2 Cross-Hair Problem
item.author: invalid@example.com (Elextro)
item.dc:creator: Elextro
item.content:encoded:
This isn't a problem with the mod per-se, but, it's a problem occuring by the mod. Here's the deal. When I'm playing the FEBA mode, it's all fine, but when I want to play, for example, a Team Deathmatch, on-line play, or mission play, the cross-hair for aiming isn't their. The funny thing is, that it is their for the FEBA mode. I have been playing for about 2 weeks now with it like this, and have gotten pretty good. It may not even be a problem with the mod, but a button. But, as far as I...

FEBA2 Cross-Hair Problem

I dont really know where to put it or how to use it all i want is to be able to use the paintball gun.. can someone tell me where to put it and how to install it? and also, how do i use it in multiplayer against one of my friends? i would like to use it on him.. please give me detailed instructions on where to put it.. thanks a lot..

i...

item.title: -=[ Simple Items Mod ]=-
item.author: invalid@example.com (RisK|Slam)
item.dc:creator: RisK|Slam
item.content:encoded:
I REALLY want the Simple Items mod, but the link is broken, and funnily enough the link to report broken links is broken
Anyway, here is the link to the review: http://www.planetunreal.com/modsquad/asp/breviews.asp?344
If anyone has the file simpleitems.umod, please tell me!
You can reply to this thread or e-mail me or add me to MSN Messenger at: razerboy_001@hotmail.com

Thanks to anyone that can help.

item.title: Wolfpack Studios In Search of Talented Artists and Level Builders
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ashen_Temper)
item.dc:creator: Ashen_Temper
item.content:encoded:
I am the Community Manager for Wolfpack Studios, a Ubisoft Company, and today I have updated our website with two new positions. The reason I am posting this information here is both require Unreal engine technology experience (as in you have a good grasp in how it works) and I figured this would be one of the best places to post about such a position.

So, if you are a highly motivated individuals interested in pursuing a career in the burgeoning market of online entertainment and have a...

Wolfpack Studios In Search of Talented Artists and Level Builders

item.title: UT Cache Cleaner
item.author: invalid@example.com (aeuzent)
item.dc:creator: aeuzent
item.content:encoded:
I ran into a problem with the UT Cache Cleaner for the original Unreal Tournament. It looked like the program of my dreams. Save all those great maps and mods I download so I can play em with bots at my own convience. And for awhile things were great and everyone was happy.

Then some mod that shouldn't have been installed was and now I can't play Unreal Tournament at all. I don't even know which one it was so it's not like I can go digging through the file directories to delete it...

UT Cache Cleaner

item.title: Infiltration modification 2.75
item.author: invalid@example.com (The Wicked One)
item.dc:creator: The Wicked One
item.content:encoded:
I have recently ran into a bit of trouble finding one of my all time favorite UT modifications. According to a review, your site has the modification "Infiltration 2.75" for Unreal Tournament.

I've played the mod from several years back and least to say, it was one of the most fun and addicting mods I've played. Unfortunately, due to a computer upgrade, I lost the modification. (Well actually, I just got a whole new computer.) When I tried to find it again from the Infiltration site,...

Infiltration modification 2.75

item.title: Mods AND CLAN Matches!
item.author: invalid@example.com (thepostman)
item.dc:creator: thepostman
item.content:encoded:
I need to know what to look for in clan matches to determine if the clan who we are playing are cheating! We have played some people in matches who are good players and have no problem playing and even winning against them on thier public server ,but in clan wars they go into a godlike mode and their skills improve 10 times the level they actually play at! Like they can telefrag up a building without diein or falling to the ground! Shoot us while they are under...

Mods AND CLAN Matches!
